name: Hanoi Vang Hotel Hanoi
address: 111 Hoang Ngan, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Well-placed in the business, restaurants, shopping area of Hanoi city, Hanoi Vang Hotel Hanoi provides a most conducive spot for you to take a break from your busy days. With its location just from the city center and from the airport, this 1-star hotel attracts numerous travelers each year. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Hanoi Vang Hotel Hanoi is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, laundry service, elevator are just a few of the facilities that set Hanoi Vang Hotel Hanoi apart from other hotels in the city.

Experience high quality room facilities during your stay here. Some rooms include mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, provided to help guests recharge after a long day. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Hanoi Vang Hotel Hanoi is an ideal place of stay for travelers seeking charm, comfort and convenience in Hanoi.
